title: Dwarven Foresight (4R45)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf to take a Free Peoples card stacked on a [Dwarven] condition into hand.
Lore:	”'I would guess that the burned bones of the hobbits are now mingled with the Orcs'.'”
Rarity:	R
